description: The National Fire Incident Reporting System (NFIRS) is a reporting standard that fire departments use to uniformly report on the full range of their activities, from fire to Emergency Medical Services (EMS) to severe weather and natural disasters.
workflowDescription: This procedure shall be completed 48hours before any events.

incidentSteps.instruction: Curzon Hall Lobby staircase pressurisation can be triggered from fire alarm.
incidentSteps.helpText: Must inform control room if triggering fire alarm.

incidentSteps.instruction: Curzon Hall Lobby Court West external Gates can be unlocked remotely.
